definition: to control/to restrict/(PRC law) non-custodial sentence with specified restrictions on one's activities for up to 3 years (e.g. not to participate in demonstrations)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

pinyin: kong1 zhong1 jiao1 tong1 guan3 zhi4
kong1 zhong1 jiao1 tong1 guan3 zhi4 yuan2

sentences.english: Replacing thiomersal in vaccines would require regulatory approval.
sentences.chinese: 替换疫苗中的硫柳汞还需要管制审批。

sentences.english: The performance of air traffic control system was evaluated by using Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP).
sentences.chinese: 针对管制中心系统，利用层次分析法评估其系统效能。

sentences.english: The goods supplied shall only be those of best quality.
sentences.chinese: 本公司的产品制造有极严格的品质管制。

sentences.english: Air traffic controllers had already informed the military about the hijacking.
sentences.chinese: 空中交通管制员已通知军方有关劫机的事情。

sentences.english: The new method of traffic control is well schemed.
sentences.chinese: 新的交通管制设计得很好。

sentences.english: Such advance studies can greatly expedite regulatory approval.
sentences.chinese: 这种预先研究可以大大加快管制审批。

sentences.english: The new method of the traffic control is well schemed.
sentences.chinese: 新的交通管制设计得很好。

sentences.english: But the librarian, who believed in calling a spade a spade , rebutted those he stole the books.
sentences.chinese: 管制员却打开天窗说亮话，反驳他其实是想偷书。

sentences.english: The merger is subject to standard regulatory and shareholder approvals.
sentences.chinese: 合并计划尚需得到管制部门和股东们的同意。

sentences.english: It also aims to safeguard public health through testing and control of live food animals.
sentences.chinese: 该署并检验和管制食用牲口，保障市民的健康。

sentences.english: More lawsuits challenging gun-control laws are now likely.
sentences.chinese: 现在越来越多的诉讼可能向枪支管制法律提出挑战。

sentences.english: Factor Market, Property Rights and Transaction Costs, Government.
sentences.chinese: 交易费用，政府管制和租值消散。

sentences.english: He says deregulation would increase supply in such fields.
sentences.chinese: 他说解除管制可能会使得这些领域的供应增加。

sentences.english: Controls on foreign exchange no longer limit their freedom to travel abroad.
sentences.chinese: 外汇管制再也不能限制他们出国旅行。

sentences.english: Street lighting was dimmed out during the war.
sentences.chinese: 战时街道照明实行半灯火管制。

sentences.english: Laws and regulations on the control of such chemicals have gradually been perfected.
sentences.chinese: 不断健全管制易制毒化学品的法规和规章。

definition: to go through/to pass through/to be in general use
to seal/to close/to confine/to seal off/to close down/sealed/confined/closed/unreceptive
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
